mapper.select: select distinct m.permission from xl_menu m left join xl_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join xl_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join xl_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.deleted = 0 and rm.deleted = 0 and ur.deleted = 0 and r.deleted = 0 and m.status = 0 and r.status = 0 and ur.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.router_query, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.permission,'') as permission, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.sort from xl_menu m where m.deleted = 0 and m.menu_type in (0, 1) and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.sort

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.router_query, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.permission,'') as permission, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.sort from xl_menu m left join xl_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join xl_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join xl_role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id left join xl_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where m.deleted = 0 and rm.deleted = 0 and ur.deleted = 0 and r.deleted = 0 and r.deleted = 0 and u.deleted = 0 and u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in (0, 1) and m.status = 0 AND r.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.sort
select menu_id as id,menu_name as name,parent_id as parentId, menu_type as type from xl_menu where status = 0
